transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Hanji sir, Highposona site cluster head IndiaMART kaise hain aap?
Customer: Ha badhiya hu mai.
Executive: Ji, sir aapne concern raise kiya hua hai inquiries ko lekar aur brand aapko Godrej brand ke liye ja rahi hai usko lekar.
Sir aapne catalog se humne bahut sara content Godrej related dala hua hai.
Aur dusra isme aapne har product ke aage apna brand name bhi lagaya hua hai. Sir ye sare corrections hum karna chah rahe the one go mein aapke sath.
Taaki aap online rehte aur koi galti nahi hoti mere executive se.
To aisa kuch possible hai sir ki hum isko aap video meeting pe aa jate aur hum ispe do ghanta aapke sath samay laga ke pura kar dete isko?
Customer: Aapke yaha Preeti karke koi madam hai unse meri baat hui thi.
Executive: Preeti ji mujhe hi report karti hai, ha.
Customer: Accha to Preeti is already on the job.
Executive: Nahi sir, I know hai ki can I know your designation please? Sir that's what I said but but for me I report to the VP of the company, the vice president of the company. I am Sonal Singh and I am cluster head here.
Customer: Oh okay so that's fine. Can you answer my one simple question ki today you have it's very nice of you to get in touch with me regarding my problems, my queries and the issues that I have been facing and for what I have raised my concerns. To abhi tak aisa kyu nahi ho raha tha? Why this two hours now? Ye pichle teen char saal se main time and again I have been repeating ki ye aapka jo system hai, aapka jo process hai wo flawed hai. Bilkul flawed hai.
Isliye ye serious flaw isliye hai ki paisa aap upfront lete ho saal bhar ka, do saal ka jo bhi hai, whatever the people are paying and after that aap ek customer jo Google pe ja kar ke fireproof safe ya kuch bhi in product ko search karta hai aur aapka just because you are paying Google aur aapka algorithm hai to aapka waha pe number one mein jata hai. He simply clicks and you convert into your buylead.
Wo buylead nahi hai. He was just kya bolte hai visiting some particular sites. He wanted to have some information or data. Ek to ye hai. Baki iske alawa maine n number of times jo hai so aapka jo modus operandi hai uske upar bhi maine bahut serious concerns raise kiye the ki ya to aap logo ko sirf aur sirf Godrej ke sath kam karna chahiye aur ya nahi to jo ekdam cheaply priced products sell karte hai market mein unke sath kam karna chahiye because you don't know or either you don't want to know or don't want to get into the basics ki customer psyche kya hai. Aapko sab malum hai because you are also in the Indian market aur Indian market mein customer ka behavior on an average kya hota hai ye aapko pata hai. But still when it comes to collection of money on customers us samay aap mein koi suchita, honesty ye nahi hoti hai ki hamare yaha ITC contractor nahi hai aapka. Aap pehla hoga ya fir hamare yaha is tarike ka onboarding abhi tak nahi hai. Hamare paas wo technical know how nahi hai ki hum usko jo hai so promote kar payenge. Ye sab cheez to nahi hoti hai. Ye sab cheez main char panch saal se dekh raha hu and I have been voicing but hota kuch nahi hai isliye aadmi thak jata hai.
To thik hai do ghanta nahi teen ghanta dene ko main tayar hu provided it is really jo hai so fruitful, beneficial. Nahi to aisa aapka naam hai gladiator hata diya, Godrej laga diya ye kar diya ye madam. Main bahut jyada bolna nahi chahta hu lekin ye sab kar chuka hu main. Main bahut char panch saal se jab se maine apna ye kam shuru kiya hai tab se sare permutation combination chat GPT AI kya bolte hai just dial wale ka alag rehta hai. Hamara jo apna website bana raha hai uska alag natak rehta hai ki nahi Google pe long term kill dalta hai isme ye dalna hai aur main khud bhi IndiaMART pe baith kar ke ghanto research karta rehta hu ki maximum inquiries ya leads kis naam se hai. Heavy steel locker ya iron safe steel locker ya kya kya hai wo sab main karta rehta hu. 10 din ye karta hu, 20 din wo karta hu hota kuch nahi hai dhak ke teen paat because customer to wahi hai na. Customer ko chahiye sasta. Abhi dekho abhi 21000 ka maine dala hai. Maine isliye aap logo ko kaha tha ki aap log ekdam dhakkan ho. Salary lene ke chakkar mein pade rehte ho lekin kam mein quality kaise develop kiya jaye kisi ko koi matlab nahi hai. Nahi sir aapne is saal continue kiya iska matlab pichle saal aapko bahut badhiya mil gaya hoga. Yes sir aap bahut buddhiman hai aur hum log wakai bahut bewakoof hai, gadhe hai. Ki thode se emotional hai ki chalo thik hai koi baat nahi itne log kar hi rahe the ek bar aur kar ke dekhte hai kuch to ho jayega. Kuch nahi hota hai. Jisko moksh chahiye usko marna padega khud. Ambani ji ko agar moksh chahiye na to isme koi unko help nahi kar sakta hai. Unke badle koi dusra marega aur usko moksh mil jayega nahi hoga. Aapko safalta chahiye aapko khud hi ghumna padega. Ye IndiaMART jo hai na us dal pe ghee ka tadka hai. Aap 95% apna kam khud karo aur uske baad IndiaMART lo tab visibility hoti hai. Ek bharoso, ek bal, ek aash, vishwas apni buddhi, apna paisa agar aapka majboot hai tab IndiaMART aapko help karega. Aapka if you have every system in place you have your field sales executives running in market all across India you have dealers everything everything then only IndiaMART ek visibility dega ki koi aake search kar raha hai ki ha ye product hai tab wo aapko phone karega to bolega nearest dealer kidhar hai to yaha pe hai to tab jao. This is how IndiaMART helps. It does not help to get you orders. It strengthens your presence. Samajh rahi hai madam? To ye jo hai so it's very nice ki aap VP ke sath kam karti hai but it takes guts. Salary ke alawa nikal kar ke bahar ke yaha ye system mein ye lacuna hai, ye flaw hai and the people are really facing. People se I don't care. Jo chhote wale hai na wo chhote wale aaj maine aawaz uthai hai kal ko dusra uthayega. Jo bhi apne paise se imandari se jiska paisa kamaya hua hai beimani wala main nahi janta hu. Imandari se jiska paisa kamaya hua hai wo he will raise concern aur agar aap us concern ko tackle nahi karoge aap imandari se to he will get away from you aur hoga.
Executive: Sir mujhe aapke yaha itna sara jo hai na aap log ke bolte jab bhi kuch bhi bolo ek to main bolna band kar diya hai lekin jab bhi kabhi kuch yaad aaya bol diya. Sir main actually dekh raha tha ki na aapke yaha pe wo product jo listing hai usme kuch flaw lag raha hai usme kuch keywords idhar ke udhar hai to ek sath thoda baithe to thik kar dete hai. To are bhaiya to tum account manager kis chidiya ka naam hai fir? Tum sote rehte ho kya? Tumko daily kam nahi karna us account pe hafte mein ek din dekh lena hai 15 din mein kabhi ek bar dekh lena hai ki kya chal raha hai tum char mahina teen mahina dekhoge nahi aur jab main kuch bolu to sir aapke account mein na ye naam thoda idhar udhar ho gaya hai wo kar dete hai abhi wo wo Rathore ji hai Preeti ji unhone bataya ki ITC contractor ka jo aapne India mein top ye kya bolte hai keyword chala rakha hai usme hamare yaha koi hai hi nahi aur usme kuch inquiries nahi aati usko hata dete hai to main ye imandari to marketing wale ko dikhani chahiye thi na ki jab hai nahi to tum le kyu rahe ho? Kal ko tum latrine saf karne wala safety tanker ka bhi service le loge nahi hai fir bhi le loge kyuki tumko paisa chahiye. You are not at all ethical. Paise chahiye onboarding ka uske baad apna dekhte raho apna kuch bhi karte raho ha hum dekhenge ye karenge to us isi samay jo hai so aapko dekhna chahiye.
Executive: Unn kuch logo ki wajah se sabko problem hoti hai but I will make sure ki kal jo aap time denge uske upar hum pure efforts laga ke apna best result aapko dene ki koshish karenge.
Customer: Aapko jo maine bola hai aap samajh rahi hai?
Executive: Main aapki baat samajh gayi. Being main aisa koi aaltu faltu aadmi nahi hu. Emotional aadmi isliye hu ki I always stay true to my character. Main apna character jo hai so Ambani ke liye alag aur ek garib aadmi ke liye alag nahi rakhta hu. I always act as a true person aur isliye maine I left my job after working in the industry for 15 years. It's not that I am an uneducated person. I have seen I have seen the weathers. Ha I have seen the weathers I have seen the people I have seen their characters and integrity kaise do paise ke liye aur iske liye log upar niche chatukarita karte hai ki sir but I did not succumb to those things. I opted out of the system because I thought that main pyaz aur roti kha kar zinda reh sakta hu mujhe three BHK aur Mercedes nahi chahiye. This is the strength of character and integrity isliye mujhe hurt hota hai ki yaar do paise main kamata hu jhola lekar ke main ghumta hu aur ye lutere aa jate hai IndiaMART just dial trade IndiaMART aapko chand tare dilwa dunga ye character ye keyword chala dunga India level pe national level pe aapka ye ho jayega wo ho jayega sir we don't kya bolte hai ki matlab commit orders but ye visibility ke baad hi orders hote hai to isliye visibility hum ye kar denge wo kar denge. Maine ek simple sa sawal pucha Preeti ji ko ki aapke yaha se jo orders aayenge wo bina hamare catalog pe gaye hue to nahi aayenge to jab catalog mein hi agar din bhar ke char dikh rahe hai to ghanta mere ko order milne wala hai to aap kya kar rahe ho us cheez ke liye aapki team kya kar rahi hai don't take my words personal. There is nothing against you or Preeti madam or any Ranjit or any Saxena and Rastogi. I have spoken to n number of people and I can remember their names also but system ke prati aawaz uthana padta hai because aap paise lete samay ekdam upfront hota hai ki nahi ek mahina do mahina abhi ke abhi de dijiye aur service pure saal aap humko jhelate raho. Agar itna guts aap mein bhi hai ki nahi humne 2 lakh ya 1 lakh liya hai to hum aapko 10 lakh ka order dilayenge I am not talking about inquiries kyuki orders ke baad profit nikalta hai aur us profit mein se aapko diya jata hai to 10 lakh ke order mein main 20% ya 30% bhi kamata hu 3 lakh aur 3 lakh mein se 2 lakh aapke de du to pura saal kya matlab main business kar raha hu ki duniya ka sabse bewakoof aur jahil aadmi hu padha likha. Ye apne vice president ko jara samjhana national stock exchange ya BSC pe list karane ke prati wo apna apna kam kar rahe hai lekin hamara kam nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Sir main ek bar wapas se dekhti hu aapka account mujhe aap ek mauka dijiye I will get this done. Mere ko kal aap bataiye kal hum 12 baje ke baad jis samay bhi aap bolenge hum accordingly meeting lagaate hai ek bar. Abhi 12 baje ke baad 1 baje lunch hota hai you require minimum two hours to will it be matlab ye ye does it make sense to aap lunch ke baad karoge isko? Matlab aapka aapka lunch hota hai kya 1 baje? Matlab hamara lunch aapke yaha bhi to hota hoga na lunch. Nahi matlab aisa kuch nahi hai sir hum to 2 baje 3 baje jo availability hoti hai jis samay kam nahi hota hai us samay kar lete hai. Hmm thik hai to isko aap 12 baje schedule karo then I I don't have any issue.
Executive: Thik hai main 12 baje ka calendar dalwa rahi hu and I will also join this call. Thik hai? Ha aur usme pura thoda data research catalog because aisa nahi ki main kuch bolta rahu aur aap usko counter na karo. Main chahta hu ki aap counter karo aur uske baad main yaha se data dikha kar hi aap se baat karungi. Ha uske baad fir main yaha se karu to mujhe bhi thoda thoda kuch to sukun mile ki ha thik hai paisa na mila order na mila to kuch to mujhe mile bhai. Thoda aap log padh likh kar ke samajh kar ke sab log jo hai so order kisko bolte hai inquiry kisko bolte hai quality kya hoti hai data kya hota hai analysis kisko bolte hai seasonal fluctuation kisko bolte hai brand kisko bolte hai loyalty kise aap pura analysis kar ke aao tab kal baat karte hai.
Executive: Sure sir. Yeah okay okay thank you. Thank you so much sir have a nice day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Concerns regarding inquiries and Godrej brand.

- System and processes are flawed.

- Converting site visitors into buyleads incorrectly.

- Modus operandi concerns.

- Lack of honesty in taking money upfront.

- Product listing flaws and incorrect keywords.

- Lack of quality in work.



Resolution:

- Executive will review the account again.

- Meeting scheduled for the next day at 12 PM.

- Executive will join the call.



Next Steps: 

- Meeting scheduled for the next day at 12 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, catalog, keywords, orders, visibility
